about_the_game:
Play disc golf in an immersive virtual reality world! Whether you've never played disc golf, you play every day, or you're somewhere in between, you'll find an experience for you in the Disc Dimension. Customize the game to match your system, gameplay style, VR comfort, and skill level. Learn how to control disc flight in a powerful, high-fidelity simulation with dynamic wind! Build your bag by collecting numerous unique discs with amazing designs, after discovering secrets and earning rewards.

Visit our Training Hill, where you learn the basics of disc golf, hone your disc golf shots, and complete challenges! Use Throw Assist to effortlessly launch distance shots from your chair, or turn it all the way down for a true-to-life simulated experience.

Put your real-world disc golf skills to the test in a Natural Round, where it's just you vs. nature! Face challenges and lines familiar on traditional courses. Throw your favorite shot shapes, and master your form. Track arm speed, spin force, disc angle, and more! Hit your gaps, develop your hyzer flips, hone your touch upshots, and use any other throws in your arsenal! Increase your putting percentage and go for distance on your drive. Develop your disc golf game, and take what you've learned to a course near you!

In an Adventure Round, face mind-bending hazards that change each round, altering your course strategy! How low can you score, and how stylish can you be? Confront distance-traversing portals, speed-altering fields, gravity-warping orbs, and more! Each hole presents a unique puzzle, blending traditional obstacles like trees and sand with magical forces that test your skill and strategy.

Technical Features include detailed textures and lighting, spatialized soundscapes using Steam Audio, and SteamVR velocity prediction for precise throws. The game supports 1k, 2k, and 4k textures with a dynamic resolution option, so you can scale the settings to match the performance your system can handle. We support OpenXR, so you can play via SteamVR with your favorite devices that support this interface including Oculus devices, Valve Index, HTC Vive, and many others.

Whether you're a seasoned disc golfer seeking a new challenge or a newcomer enticed by the magic of VR sports, prepare for an immersive journey beyond the fairway!
detailed_description:
Play disc golf in an immersive virtual reality world! Whether you've never played disc golf, you play every day, or you're somewhere in between, you'll find an experience for you in the Disc Dimension. Customize the game to match your system, gameplay style, VR comfort, and skill level. Learn how to control disc flight in a powerful, high-fidelity simulation with dynamic wind! Build your bag by collecting numerous unique discs with amazing designs, after discovering secrets and earning rewards.

Visit our Training Hill, where you learn the basics of disc golf, hone your disc golf shots, and complete challenges! Use Throw Assist to effortlessly launch distance shots from your chair, or turn it all the way down for a true-to-life simulated experience.

Put your real-world disc golf skills to the test in a Natural Round, where it's just you vs. nature! Face challenges and lines familiar on traditional courses. Throw your favorite shot shapes, and master your form. Track arm speed, spin force, disc angle, and more! Hit your gaps, develop your hyzer flips, hone your touch upshots, and use any other throws in your arsenal! Increase your putting percentage and go for distance on your drive. Develop your disc golf game, and take what you've learned to a course near you!

In an Adventure Round, face mind-bending hazards that change each round, altering your course strategy! How low can you score, and how stylish can you be? Confront distance-traversing portals, speed-altering fields, gravity-warping orbs, and more! Each hole presents a unique puzzle, blending traditional obstacles like trees and sand with magical forces that test your skill and strategy.

Technical Features include detailed textures and lighting, spatialized soundscapes using Steam Audio, and SteamVR velocity prediction for precise throws. The game supports 1k, 2k, and 4k textures with a dynamic resolution option, so you can scale the settings to match the performance your system can handle. We support OpenXR, so you can play via SteamVR with your favorite devices that support this interface including Oculus devices, Valve Index, HTC Vive, and many others.

Whether you're a seasoned disc golfer seeking a new challenge or a newcomer enticed by the magic of VR sports, prepare for an immersive journey beyond the fairway!
legal_notice:
© 2023 Alchemist Brew Game Studios

Disclaimer: All discs in Disc Dimension are fictional, and do not represent real discs, disc brands, or any disc manufacturing company or retailer.  The discs in this game are made solely for the purposes of playing this game, and any similar names or other likeness are purely accidental.
name: Disc Dimension

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600K or AMD Ryzen 5 2600 (or equivalent)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 or AMD RX 580 (or equivalent)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • VR Support: Open XR, requires motion controllers. Windows Mixed Reality is Not Supported
  • Additional Notes: Controller strap or knuckles recommended
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-8700 or AMD Ryzen 7 3700X (or equivalent)
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 2060 or AMD RX 5700 XT (or equivalent)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • VR Support: Open XR, requires motion controllers. Windows Mixed Reality is Not Supported
  • Additional Notes: Controller strap or knuckles recommended

short_description: Step into the Disc Dimension, a VR disc golf arena for casual players and veterans alike. Throw aces from your chair, or train your true form with realistic throwing, physics, & stats. Tour through beautiful VR courses with mind-bending hazards, hidden secrets, and numerous unique discs to collect!
